Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Ciutadella de Menorca (Santandria), 2U Playa Sandrandria Menorca Hotel - Adults Only is convenient to Cathedral of Menorca and Plaza de Alfonso III. This beach hotel is within the vicinity of Naveta d'Es Tudons and Macarelleta Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 41 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private furnished balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature bidets and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don't miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an outdoor pool, a 24-hour fitness center, and a seasonal outdoor pool. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge) that operates within 150 meters.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of 2U Playa Sandrandria Menorca Hotel - Adults Only. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a beach bar. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of 2U Playa Sandrandria Menorca Hotel - Adults Only. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a beach bar. Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Located in Ciutadella de Menorca (Santandria), 2U Playa Sandrandria Menorca Hotel - Adults Only is convenient to Cathedral of Menorca and Plaza de Alfonso III. This beach hotel is within the vicinity of Naveta d'Es Tudons and Macarelleta Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Cathedral of Menorca - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Plaza de Alfonso III - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Naveta d'Es Tudons - 5.2 km / 3.3 mi
Macarelleta Beach - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi
Son Saura Beach - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
Algaiarens Beach - 10.1 km / 6.3 mi
Cala Mitjana Beach - 12.5 km / 7.7 mi
Santa Agueda Castle - 15.4 km / 9.6 mi
Cala Pregonda - 19.2 km / 11.9 mi
Son Bou Beach - 22 km / 13.6 mi
Monte Toro - 23.4 km / 14.5 mi
Golf Son Parc - 27.9 km / 17.3 mi
Xoroi Caves - 28.1 km / 17.4 mi
Canutells Beach - 31.5 km / 19.6 mi
Favaratix Lighthouse - 36.5 km / 22.7 mi

The preferred airport for 2U Playa Sandrandria Menorca Hotel - Adults Only is Mahon (MAH-Minorca) - 35.3 km / 21.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
